original_text: But I will take care of your widows and the children who have no family.
korean_text: 네 고아들을 버려도 내가 그들을 살리리라 네 과부들은 나를 의지할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: But I will take care of your widows
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 너희 과부들을 돌볼 것이다

sentences.original_text: and the children who have no family
